description:
Chastille faces repercussions for her refusal to hunt down Zagan. Yet another challenger assaults Zagan`s castle, but this one is doomed to a different kind of punishment than the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even an Archdemon Should Know Better Than to Hit a Child
Maou Datte Chiisai Ko ni Te o Ageru no wa Yokunai
On ne frappe pas les enfants, même quand on est Archidémon
魔王だって小さい子に手をあげるのは良くない
